title: Sprouts Salad 🥗 | Mung Bean Sprouts Salad | Healthy Diet 🙂
content:
Salad recipe: Sprouts Salad  Servings: 3 Duration: 5 minutes  A bowl of healthiest food loaded with fresh veggies and spices, a must try recipe: Sprouts Salad 🙂 It’s delicious, healthy and nutritious food. For more salad recipes, links shared at the end of this post. Click here for Health Benefits of Mung Bean Sprouts Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Mung Beans Sprouts  - 1 cup ( Click for recipe )
  • White onion - 1/4 cup - finely chopped
  • Red tomato 🍅- 1/2 cup - finely chopped
  • Grated carrot 🥕 - 1/4 cup
  • Fresh mini cucumber 🥒- 1/2 - Finely chopped
  • Cilantro - 1 Tb sp - finely chopped
  • Lemon juice - 1 Tb sp
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Red chilly Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Dry Mango Powder - 1/2 tsp
Procedure:
  • In a bowl add sprouts, onion, tomato, cilantro, cucumber, grated carrot , salt, red chilly powder and dry mango powder
  • Mix well and add lemon juice 🍋
  • Serve immediately and enjoy your healthy diet
  • Happy Cooking 😃 & Have a beautiful day 🌼

Note:
  • The choice of vegetables in salad is all your choice
  • Adjust spices & salt according to taste
  • Instead of red chilly powder, you can also add red Paprika or cayenne powder
